summary: This Mod replaces the wounded dead women from Winterhold and Solsteim (Dragonborn DLC is Not needed for this mod as Dragonborn DLC uses vanilla mesh) to a bustier, curvier CBBE body type.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Wounds
Author: Edhildil
9,9,2015
ver1




[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

[color=#ff0000][size=6]Adult mod! Contains Nudity. NSFW.[/size][/color]

This Mod replaces the wounded dead women from Windhelm and Solsteim (Dragonborn DLC is Not needed for this mod as

Dragonborn DLC uses vanilla mesh) to a bustier, curvier CBBE body type. This is a very small tweak to the overall game. [color=#ffd966]It

also allows the player to craft the wound outfits under "Hide" catagory if you want to look freaky.[/color] Upgradable with Arcane

smithing perk. Contains two different outfits, one bikini style, one open top style. Female only.


[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


CBBE compatible skin textures.
Â 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.


[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]


Edhildil for the meshes


Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
GIMP 2


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also

be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
